dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Beware, intruder! What business do you have in the realm of the ethereal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek answers about this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Answers you seek? Foolish mortal. I care not for your inquiries.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm. I am lost and need guidance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Lost? Lost souls are the easiest prey. Do you dare face your fate?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave this place. Please, let me go.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic cowardice. I will not spare you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not afraid. I will fight if necessary.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for a fool. Prepare to face the wrath of the ethereal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your realm intrigues me. Can you show me around?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intrigued, are we? Curiosity killed many before you. Will you heed caution?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will be cautious. Show me what you find worthy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Follow, mortal, and do not stray.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear nothing. Lead the way, specter.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Follow, and may the ethereal embrace you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not bow to threats. Show yourself, haunt!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiant. I admire your bravery, even in ignorance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You admire bravery? Then let us test each other's strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, mortal. Prepare for a duel of fates.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no trouble. Let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peacefully it shall be. I sense no challenge in you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I did not come here to be threatened by a ghost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Threatened? Merely a warning. But are you one to be threatened?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not easily intimidated, spectral being. Proceed with caution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No intimidation needed. Your presence here speaks enough.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully if that is your wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision. Leave and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stay and face whatever challenges you pose.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave or foolish, time will tell. Face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your warnings do not affect me. Face me or let me pass.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resilient, I see. But do you understand the consequences of your actions?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared for whatever consequences may come.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Face the ethereal consequences of defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat if that is what you wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat. A wise choice, lesser mortal. Depart and be forgotten.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge, not conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Mortals seek what they cannot comprehend.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I humbly ask for your guidance in this mystic realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Guidance? Mortals seldom heed wise counsel. Are you different?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to listen and learn, ethereal being.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Willingness is rare. Follow, and perhaps you shall learn.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge, not lectures. Show me or be gone.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impatience. Knowledge is earned, not demanded. You will see.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will find the knowledge myself. I need no guidance from a ghost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Self-reliance. A trait many claim. Do you dare test it?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do. Leave me be and I will find answers on my own.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Seek what you will, mortal, but beware the unknown path.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your tests are meaningless. Show me what you know, haunt.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness. Some learn the hard way. Prepare for the consequences.
